title: AsteroPIPs
description: AsteroPIPs is a simple game where you control a spaceship to shoot and avoid space rocks.
author: @killes007

meta.controls: Use the LEFT WHEEL BUTTON to start / shoot, TUNE KNOB UP and DOWN for rotate, and PUSH to move forward. TOP TORCH button to exit the game.
meta.instructions: Control the spaceship and shoot the asteroids. Avoid colliding with them. The game ends when you hit an asteroid.
meta.tip: Move and shoot is a good tactic!
